Pleasant, friendly, and the dinner was good.
Ms. C√∫c was very helpful with everything.
The room was suitable for a group of friends.
The restaurant staff is super nice, the food is delicious, and neat. Home gave me a very Ha Giang experience.

A truly authentic Homestay. The bedding is a bit hard, but it has a mosquito net, and the showers are basic, but with hot water. A very quiet place at the top of a small staircase overlooking the street.

A small wooden house. We had a room with a mountain view. We had a great stay, and there were only two guests, so we barely heard any noise. There was a mosquito net over the bed, which was perfect for the night. The location is good, but you might get confused with another homestay right next door. Here, you have to climb some rather steep stairs to reach the house.
The lady boss is so kind and friendly. She's like family. I highly recommend her.

We stayed here during our Ha Giang loop tour. The overnight stay was, in a word, terrible. Don't go here. The photos on Booking.com don't reflect the reality. The room is incredibly small and very stuffy. The bed is rock hard and very thin. We spent more time awake than sleeping because the bed was so uncomfortable. We also saw a mouse crawling across the ceiling several times during the night.

We had booked breakfast included. The owner asked if we wanted tea, and we said we preferred coffee, which was no problem. When we paid for the room, we had to pay for the coffee because it wasn't included in the breakfast, which was really unacceptable.

We've been traveling for a long time and aren't exactly fussy travelers. But this stay was by far the worst we've ever experienced.

We stayed two nights in this beautiful, friendly, and quiet place.
It's clean and feels great.
We had dinner with Cuc and Bac on the second night; it was a great time, and the food was very, very good for such a low price.
We highly recommend it!

Terrible accommodations! We expressly warn you: this was by far the worst accommodation we've had in all of Vietnam so far. There are mice and spiders in the room. The mattresses are extremely hard, and I couldn't sleep all night because of the dog barking. The accommodations are filthy.

We spent a lovely night at Lo Lo A Hai Homestay.
The shared room is large and clean, with privacy and a fan.
The best part was the dinner we were lucky enough to share with the local family. Karaoke lasted until 10 p.m., then we were able to sleep peacefully after many sips of happy water.
A truly unique and beautiful experience, I highly recommend it.
Homestay is a renovated Lo Lo community house, very chill and clean.

The welcome was adequate, but the bedding was very uncomfortable, especially after a day on the roads of Ha Giang. Cleanliness was questionable; you sleep on a board covered with a very hard and thin futon. There wasn't enough light in the sleeping area (it's so cramped it's practically empty), there was nowhere to put your belongings, and it was very cold at night. The bathrooms were also very uncomfortable and unclean. It's a shame because the evening meal was good, but there was no breakfast; you have to request it in advance.

A lovely, typical house of the region, well located in Meo Vac. The center is within walking distance. | The bathrooms are very good. The showers are large and there is hot water; you just have to know how to press the button... | The ‚Ä¶

Be careful! There are two homestays with the exact same name and neighbors.
We stayed in the one on the left.
- Large dorm, very cozy and comfortable.
- Good food, lovely staff.
- Clean shower, hot water.
Cons:
- No one at reception before 8 a.m., so for early risers who want their coffee early, the wait can be long.
- Quite noisy: you can hear everything from the rooms and the dorm, so if you have a party group, you'll have trouble sleeping.
And since it's in the heart of the city, it gets very noisy quite early.
But overall, a very good stay!

Regarding the homestay on the right, we went there for breakfast, and it's just as cute and cozy! Maybe quieter :)

(The last photo is from the homestay on the right, all the others are from the homestay on the left.)

After a long scooter ride, we wanted to go to bed after a few beers. But at 10 p.m., the music was suddenly turned up loud, and we couldn't sleep anymore. There were no other guests. Was the host having a party with his family and friends? Absolutely not!

I found the dormitory quite expensive compared to what I've stayed in elsewhere. The comfort level was adequate.
Dinner was good and varied, but perhaps a bit pricey (150,000 per person).
The stilt house is very beautiful and clean. Open space, quiet, large garden, mountain view. Enthusiastic and cheerful local staff. Very suitable for large groups as well as groups of friends.
Basic comfort on poor quality futons and worn and dirty set. Very noisy. Insufficient breakfast.

This used to be a place for the cultural activities of the Lo Lo Hoa people in this area and is now rented out as a guesthouse. Clean, airy, spacious. The space inside is very cozy. There are wines and beers that are worth trying. The staff is friendly and active. A suitable place if you intend to stop in Meo Vac.

There was only one young woman who ran the accommodation. Lazy and poor customer service. It is not a restaurant. At least when I went they didn't prepare dinners. Breakfast is a Ban mi, which is brought from outside and if you want a coffee you have to ask for it because they don't even give it to you.

If you're doing the Northern Mountain Loop from Ha Giang, don't hesitate to stop in Meo Vac. It's less frequented and therefore more unspoiled than some other villages you'll pass through on your road trip. | Lolo Guest House is a charming ‚Ä¶
Enthusiastic service, fresh and delicious food. Note that the bedroom cleanliness needs to be improved. Our team of 7 people all had an itchy feeling when sleeping üòÖ ‚Ä¶

Beautiful stilt house, nice view, modern bathroom, front yard can make campfire. When I went, it had just opened for a few months so the price was 120k per person (only dormitory space), but it looked so nice, maybe when it becomes famous the price will go up :)
Lolo's house is very enthusiastic, beautiful space!! However, because of the highland area, the hot water will be slow, weak and the bathroom is not clean.

Safe, enthusiastic staff, lovely homestay owner with a lot of knowledge about the local area that you should know when learning about the culture, especially the corn wine is very delicious, drinking a lot of corn wine still doesn't give you a headache! Best!
A very peaceful and comfortable place to stay in Meo Vac. There is enough hot water for bathing. Great view. Affordable price
The night is cold because the wind comes in through the cracks in the wall. In the morning, you should light a fire for guests to warm up. You should have food for guests to drink wine or beer.
I stopped by here but there were no guests staying so I didn't choose it. The stilt house is beautiful, spacious and airy. If I go with a large group, I will stay here.
There is a need to include more information about the unique characteristics of the Lo Lo people, such as traditional clothing, and books introducing Lo Lo culture.
Clean homestay, affordable price, friendly and enthusiastic staff, relatively complete amenities
New clean house, delicious food, enthusiastic and friendly homestay owner

Perfect üëå
Ms. Cuc, super enthusiastic and cute.
If I have the chance, I will visit your house again :))) ‚Ä¶
The accommodation is right in the town center, very convenient for eating and entertainment. The space is quiet, and the staff are friendly and helpful.
Fantastic. I arrived just in time for dinner and they treated me like family. The room was perfect. A lovely memory to cherish forever.
Beautiful house, clean, friendly and enthusiastic homestay owner
At first glance it looks very crowded and okay, haven't had a chance to visit yet üò¢ ‚Ä¶
Thank you Cuc for taking good care of us.! See you next time when I go to Ha Giang.‚ò∫Ô∏è
Great family friendly will definitely be back next time
A great place to have fun and eat ‚ù§Ô∏è
Cozy stilt house, clean, view right in front of the house, will come back.
If you need to stay in Meo vac, come here. You'll get the best value for your money.
The hotel is beautiful but the service is terrible.
Doing business like this is both slow and unprofessional üôÇ ‚Ä¶
Clean and beautiful, the dorm room is too small!
Enthusiastic owner. Friendly service. Very sympathetic
Very beautiful place you should visit
I don't have anyone here but it seems ok
It is a very good home stay
